What is the Komodo Ecosystem Spotlight, and how is it related to Verus Coin?

The Komodo Ecosystem Spotlight is a series or feature that highlights various projects within the Komodo ecosystem. Verus Coin is one of the projects that has been spotlighted, suggesting that it is a part of the Komodo ecosystem and has some connection or integration with Komodo.

What is the Verus Coin Foundation, and what is its vision?

The Verus Coin Foundation is an organization dedicated to promoting and developing Verus Coin. Its vision is to create a Public Blockchain as a Service (PBaaS) platform, which would enable individuals and organizations to create their own blockchains and decentralized applications.
